climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Works With All Washers - Perfect For High Efficiency Or Standard Toploader, Front Loading Compatible With GE, LG, Samsung, Whirlpool, Maytag, Electrolux, Etc. (Not For Dryer)
Eco-Friendly Tabs - Natural Effervescent Foaming Tablets Are Septic Safe And Made With Less Packaging . Compare To Liquid Descaler And Wipes That Create Unnecessary Waste

Instant Cleaning Power - Active Self Wash Tablet Cleans So You Don't Have To Brush And Wipe Your Washing Machines. When Exposed To Water, They Break Down Into Deep Scrubbing Powder Cleaners That Breaks Down Grime And Hard Water Build Up
Bulk 24 Kit - Each Package Includes 1 Year Supply (24 Pods) Vs. Competitor 5 or 6 Tablet Packs Or Liquid Treatments Which Run Out Quickly
Odor Eliminator- No More Smelly Washer. Descaler Will Freshen Your Laundry Machine Basket, Rubber Gasket, And Internal Parts So Your Clothes Will Come Out Clean And Smelling Fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Useful, economic ,well packaged ,safe , and easy to use. Just open the door of your washing machine ,insert one capsule ,turn the water in hot cycle, normal wash ,put the lid down ..and forget about it....Will ends up been clean, odorless and ready to use.No hassle ,no struggle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY TO USE AND HANDY CLEANS OUT GUNK FROM PIPES AS WELL
reviews.reviewText: The main thing I like most about this is that: most dish washers need to be cleaned out regularly with a combination of vinegar and baking soda to remove the sulfate/byproduct of dishwasher detergent from the pipes. This bubbling tablet is basically baking soda with cleansers and deodorizers. So it serves several purposes to both declog the washer, clean it and deodorize it.I used it weekly for a month and the gunk that is normally visible in the pipes that drain the washer really disappeared. I have used vinegar and baking soda before which helped but these are so much more convenient.I use it on hot cycle once a week and my dishwasher smells fresh and good as new. No embarrassing odors when guests arrive and offer to help with the dishes.I also love the convenience of it and that the tablet totally dissolves after the washing cycle.This is a must purchase for convenience, scent and no fuss declogging.I have allergies and have to maintain a clean and hygienic home to stay on top off the allergens, I recently tried the active washing machine cleaner, and I am thoroughly impressed with the results. This product has become an essential part of my regular cleaning routine, and for good reason.First and foremost, the active washing machine cleaner really does effectively eliminate unpleasant odors and removes built-up residue from the interior drum of the washing machine. After using this cleaner, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall freshness of my laundry, as well as a reduction in musty odors that had been lingering in my machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No more STINK!
reviews.reviewText: I have an older front load washer that has nearly always had a musty odor to it. I have gone so far as to remove all of the seals to clean the hard to reach areas. Every two weeks I clean the filter. I leave the door open so that it can dry out between washing. I run white vinegar through it during the "Tub Clean Cycle". None of that made a difference. The clothes don't have an odor to them, only the tub. I was just about to ditch the washer and buy a top load machine. I am so glad that I tried this product!! I just saved me from buying a new washing machine. I strongly recommend you give it a try. The product is so inexpensive... it's definitely worth a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked better then expected
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased these wash machine cleaner tablets from Amazon, and I couldn't be more impressed with the results. My washing machine had started to develop a musty odor, and I decided to give these tablets a try based on the positive reviews. I'm so glad I did!Firstly, the convenience of these tablets is unmatched. No measuring or messy liquids – just drop a tablet into the drum and let it work its magic. The effervescence is satisfying to watch, and I appreciate that it reaches all the nooks and crannies of the machine that are hard to clean manually.Not only did these tablets eliminate the unpleasant odor, but they also left my washing machine smelling fresh and clean after just one use. It's like a breath of fresh air every time I open the door now. The product is also septic-safe, which is a huge plus for those with septic systems.I've noticed a significant improvement in the cleanliness of my laundry since using these tablets. Clothes come out smelling better and feeling fresher. It's evident that these tablets do more than just mask odors – they tackle the root of the problem by removing build-up and residue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING Life customer here!!
reviews.reviewText: First off - the handwritten note was such an amazing and sweet surprise. That's what lead me to review the product!Second - this product is AMAZING. We live in an appt that provides the W/D so you can imagine they are NASTY! also my husband does construction and welding so he is always covered in muck and mud! The washer gets very dirty very fast. The clothes smelled even after two washes! I tried bleach, vinigar, baking soda, srubing by hand etc. Nothing cleaned my washer like this. And I have to say I freaked out after my first load. Smelling them like it was the first breath after jumping out of a pool. I ran up on my husband SMELL THIS SMELL IT (he was very confused but sniffed) and I was so excited my clothes were CLEAN and smelled like lavender (my soap) they have never smelled this good!I 100% suggest this product and I WILL be buying more!! I'm a life customer now!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Mantiene limpia la lavadora, es mantenimiento preventivo.
reviews.reviewText: Funciona muy bien para que la lavadora tenga larga vida.

I am absolutely thrilled with the Washing Machine Cleaner I recently tried, and I can confidently say it deserves a glowing five-star review. This product has transformed the way I think about washing machine maintenance and cleanliness.The effectiveness of this cleaner is truly remarkable. After just one use, I noticed a significant improvement in the cleanliness and freshness of my washing machine. It effortlessly tackled residue, mold, and unpleasant odors, leaving my machine smelling clean and performing at its best.The ease of use is another standout feature. The simple and straightforward application process requires minimal effort, yet the results are substantial. I appreciate that this cleaner is compatible with various types of washing machines, making it a versatile solution for different households.The fact that this cleaner is environmentally friendly is a huge plus. It gives me peace of mind knowing that I can maintain a clean washing machine without compromising on eco-friendliness. The absence of harsh chemicals is a testament to the thoughtful formulation of this product.Regular use of this Washing Machine Cleaner has not only improved the overall hygiene of my washing machine but has also contributed to cleaner and fresher laundry. It's a small investment with significant returns in terms of the longevity and efficiency of my appliance.In conclusion, this Washing Machine Cleaner has exceeded my expectations. Its effectiveness, ease of use, and eco-friendly formula make it a standout product in the market. If you want to keep your washing machine running smoothly and your laundry smelling fresh, this cleaner is a five-star solution. Highly recommended!

Used 2 tablets on a already drum cleaned machine but still the results were amazing as I could see lot of dust was removed and manual cleaning of drum was needed. After use the machine was more clean and no bad smell and clothes were cleaner as washed in new machine.

I put one tablet in the drum and selected quick wash with hot water setting, 30 mins later I opened the door and the drum was sparking clean! Not to mention it eliminated the funky smells too. We normally use liquid which costs more and it does a far worse job at cleaning. Will happily buy these again when required. Very happy with the quality and performance. Also, thank you for the note :)

I recently purchased these Washing Machine Cleaner tablets, and I couldn't be happier with the results. Our front-loader washer had started to develop a musty odor, and I was worried about mold and mildew buildup. These tablets came to the rescue!First of all, the 24 tablets provide a full year's supply, which is incredibly convenient. Each tablet is individually wrapped, making them easy to store and use. The instructions were straightforward, and using them was a breeze. I simply placed a tablet in the detergent dispenser and ran a hot cycle without any laundry.The results were astonishing! After just one use, our washing machine smelled fresh and clean. I also noticed that our clothes came out smelling better than they had in a long time. It's clear that these tablets effectively removed the built-up residue and gunk from the drum and the laundry tub seal.I appreciate that these tablets are septic-safe and eco-friendly, so I don't have to worry about harming the environment or our septic system. Knowing that I'm using a product that's safe for both my family and the planet gives me peace of mind.Overall, these Washing Machine Cleaner tablets have exceeded my expectations. They offer excellent value for the money, provide a year's worth of cleaning, and deliver outstanding results. I highly recommend them to anyone looking to keep their washing machine and laundry smelling fresh and clean. Say goodbye to musty odors and hello to cleaner, fresher laundry!
